== License controversy ==
+
== Alleged license violation==
On June 22, 2009, Format Factory was listed on [[FFmpeg]]'s Hall Of Shame web page.<ref>{{cite web |title=Hall of Shame |url=http://www.ffmpeg.org/shame.html |publisher=ffmpeg.org |accessdate=17 February 2010}}</ref> An associated issue tracker message asserts Format Factory to be in violation of FFmpeg [[LGPL]] license.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://roundup.ffmpeg.org/roundup/ffmpeg/issue1214 |title=Issue 1214: Format Factory license violation |work=FFMpeg issue tracker |publisher=ffmpeg.org |date=22 June 2009 |accessdate=17 February 2010}}</ref> There has been no response from the developers. The issue remains unresolved.
On June 22, 2009, Format Factory was listed on [[FFmpeg]]'s Hall Of Shame web page.<ref>{{cite web |title=Hall of Shame |url=http://www.ffmpeg.org/shame.html |publisher=ffmpeg.org |accessdate=17 February 2010}}</ref> An associated issue tracker message asserts Format Factory to be in violation of FFmpeg [[LGPL]] license.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://roundup.ffmpeg.org/roundup/ffmpeg/issue1214 |title=Issue 1214: Format Factory license violation |work=FFMpeg issue tracker |publisher=ffmpeg.org |date=22 June 2009 |accessdate=17 February 2010}}</ref> There has been no response from the developers. The issue remains unresolved.
